title: TodayTix – Theater Tickets
description:
Getting theater tickets has never been easier. Created by Broadway producers, TodayTix brings you instant access to the best deals in theater today and this week. First launched for New York's Broadway and Off-Broadway, TodayTix is now available in London's West End, Chicago, Los Angeles, the San Francisco Bay Area, and Washington D.C., giving you unprecedented access to the best tickets at the best prices. 

TodayTix simplifies and streamlines the previously difficult ticket buying experience. Here's how:

- Save money. Take the guesswork out of buying theater tickets. We always list the best prices. Save up to 50%.
- Enter daily lotteries. Win free tickets, access to exclusive deals, and more! 
- Skip the lines. Book tickets in just 30 seconds and never wait in line again.
- Sign up for alerts. Find out when your favorite sold out show becomes available. 
- Refer a friend and save even more. When your friend uses your referral code, they get a discount off their first purchase, and you get a credit towards your next show! 
- Get the VIP treatment. Our customers rave about our friendly and personable service.
- Buy with confidence. Unlike many other apps, we work directly with the theatre’s box office, never with ticket brokers. 

----THE BUZZ----

"An app that solves the biggest annoyance with buying theater tickets." - Business Insider 

“TodayTix has unlocked a new generation of theatregoers.” - Huffington Post

"The Uber of Broadway tickets." - Forbes

“TodayTix is for travelers who don’t feel like killing prime New York City touring time by waiting in line at TKTS, or for those who prefer to plan a few days ahead of time rather than risking their plans to the vagaries of same-day availability.” - Frommer’s 

----CONNECT----

Twitter: www.twitter.com/todaytix
Instagram: www.instagram.com/todaytix
Web site: www.todaytix.com
short_desc: TodayTix is the easiest way to get discount theater tickets today and this week.
